thread.title: Video shows Islamic militants in the Philippines beheading a German hostage
thread.title_full: Video shows Islamic militants in the Philippines beheading a German hostage

title: Video shows Islamic militants in the Philippines beheading a German hostage
text:
Video shows Islamic militants in the Philippines beheading a German hostage Peter Jacobs,AFP Feb 27, 2017, 04.36 PM Continue reading AFP/File MUSTAFA ABDI German nationals Jurgen Kantner and his wife Sabine Merz in Berbera, Somalia on May 5, 2009. Manila (AFP) - Islamic militants in the Philippines have killed a German hostage, the SITE Intelligence group said Monday. 
A video posted by the Abu Sayyaf group, which was monitored by SITE, showed German hostage Jurgen Kantner being murdered. 
Kantner was abducted in November , and his partner Sabine Merz was shot and killed. 
A video released by Abu Sayyaf earlier this month showed Kantner pleading for his life in exchange for a $600,000 ransom. 
"If their demand of 30 million pesos is not met by Feb 26, at 3pm, they will behead the hostage and post it on social media," subtitles on the video read, according to Newsweek . 
The Associated Press reports Kantner was beheaded in the video. Follow Business Insider on
